channel.title: Other Puzzles :: CIS 301 Textbook
channel.description: We will look at a variety of other logic puzzles, each of which involve some statements being false and some statements being true. Lion and Unicorn The setup for a Lion and Unicorn puzzle can vary, but the idea is that both Lion and Unicorn have specific days that they tell only lies, and other specific days that they only tell the truth. Here is one example: Lion always lies on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Wednesdays.
